description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Prepare yourself to get seriously retro with 26 challenging minigames that make up the Minigame Marathon. Choose one of four difficulty levels and try to pass the minigames in the fewest attempts and quickest time possible, using the highly-effective but highly-dangerous "fast forward" mode if required. Playable by one to four players, and includes online score sharing.
